leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-结构预测与评估生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预测→精修→对齐→质量评估→可视化
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 推理框架 + 结构工具 + 可视化

queries: [WEB] protein structure quality assessment tools github

tools.name: AlphaPPImd
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based generative network for exploring protein-protein complex conformational ensembles
tools.detailed_description: A tool that utilizes transformer-based generative neural networks to explore and sample the conformational ensembles of protein-protein complexes, aiding in the study of protein dynamics and interactions.

tools.name: AlphaFold-disorder
tools.one_line_profile: Predicts protein disorder and disorder binding from AlphaFold structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by BioComputingUP that leverages AlphaFold predicted structures and pLDDT metrics to identify disordered regions and potential disorder-based binding sites in proteins.

tools.name: MULTICOM4
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based protein structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: The MULTICOM4 system is an advanced protein structure prediction pipeline developed by the University of Missouri, utilizing deep learning and template-based modeling techniques.

tools.name: QATEN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein model quality assessment using attention graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A high-accuracy quality assessment (QA) tool for protein structural models that employs attention-based graph neural networks to estimate the quality of predicted structures.

tools.name: plddt2csv
tools.one_line_profile: Extracts PAE and pLDDT metrics from AlphaFold2 outputs
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to extract Predicted Aligned Error (PAE) and pLDDT confidence scores from AlphaFold2 pickle files and convert them into CSV, PNG, and PDB formats for analysis.

tools.name: IQmodelo
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical software for task-based medical image quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A software package developed by DIDSR (FDA) for assessing medical image quality using model observers or human observers, focusing on task-based performance evaluation.

tools.name: tmscoring
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the TM-score metric for protein structure alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that implements the TM-score algorithm, a standard metric for assessing the topological similarity of protein structures, often used in structure prediction evaluation.

tools.name: fpocket
tools.one_line_profile: Fast open source protein pocket detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A very fast algorithm for detecting protein pockets (binding sites) based on Voronoi tessellation, widely used for druggability assessment and structure-based drug design.

tools.name: StructTokenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein structure tokenization methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate various protein structure tokenization methods, facilitating the development of generative models for protein design.

tools.name: af_plotter
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for AlphaFold3 confidence metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool from LMS Bioinformatics to generate pLDDT plots and Predicted Aligned Error (PAE) heatmaps directly from AlphaFold3 JSON outputs, aiding in the interpretation of structure prediction confidence.

tools.name: XLPFE
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning scoring function for protein-ligand interaction
tools.detailed_description: A simple and effective machine learning-based scoring function (XLPFE) designed for scoring and ranking protein-ligand complexes in drug discovery and docking tasks.

tools.name: ProQSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for developing and applying Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) models, used in cheminformatics and drug discovery to predict biological activity from chemical structure.

tools.name: CrySTINet
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure type recognition network using ResNet-Confidence submodels
tools.detailed_description: An extensible deep learning framework for recognizing crystal structure types, utilizing a Crystal Structure Type Recognition Network (CSTRNet) composed of multiple ResNet-Confidence Network (RCNet) submodels to handle variable inputs.

tools.name: protein_shapes
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics for evaluating distributional coverage of protein structure generative models
tools.detailed_description: A set of metrics designed to assess how well generative models of protein structures cover the distribution of natural protein shapes, aiding in the validation and quality assessment of protein design algorithms.

tools.name: qmeans
tools.one_line_profile: Q-Means quantum clustering algorithm implementation compatible with Scikit-Learn
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Q-Means clustering algorithm using Qiskit, designed to be compatible with Scikit-Learn for integrating quantum computing methods into classical machine learning workflows.

tools.name: Ramachandran-Plot
tools.one_line_profile: R and Python utilities for generating Ramachandran plots
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool providing R and Python scripts to generate Ramachandran plots, which are essential for validating the stereochemical quality of protein structures by visualizing backbone dihedral angles.

tools.name: Neural Ocean
tools.one_line_profile: Underwater waste detection and water quality assessment toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A project addressing ocean pollution through YoloV8-based underwater waste detection, rule-based aquatic habitat assessment, and machine learning models for classifying water suitability for drinking or irrigation.

tools.name: ArchABM
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based simulator for air quality and pandemic risk in architectural spaces
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based modeling (ABM) simulator designed to assess air quality and pandemic transmission risks within architectural spaces, facilitating public health and environmental design analysis.

tools.name: iEnhancer-DCLA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning predictor for DNA enhancers and their strength
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method (iEnhancer-DCLA) utilizing CNN, BiLSTM, and attention mechanisms to identify DNA enhancers and predict their strength from sequence data, aiding in gene transcription regulation analysis.

tools.name: MSAffect
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to evaluate AlphaFold2 robustness under MSA perturbations
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to assess the robustness of AlphaFold2 protein structure predictions by introducing adversarial perturbations to Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSA), identifying structural sensitivity and confidence shifts.

tools.name: alphafold_coloring
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to color AlphaFold predicted structures by pLDDT scores
tools.detailed_description: A utility to visualize AlphaFold confidence metrics by coloring predicted protein structures based on their per-residue pLDDT scores, facilitating quick visual quality assessment.

tools.name: ramachandraw
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for drawing Ramachandran plots
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating Ramachandran plots to visualize and validate protein backbone dihedral angles (phi/psi), supporting structural biology quality control workflows.

tools.name: insilico_design_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating protein structure diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: An in-silico design pipeline specifically built to evaluate the performance and quality of protein structures generated by diffusion models, supporting the development of generative protein design tools.

tools.name: ProteinNet
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized dataset for machine learning of protein structure
tools.detailed_description: A standardized data set designed for training and evaluating machine learning models for protein structure prediction, providing sequence and structure data in a machine-learning-ready format.

tools.name: MRI-QA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for MRI image quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based model for automating the quality assessment of 3D MRI volumes, trained on multi-site datasets (ABIDE 1) to identify artifacts and ensure data suitability for analysis.

tools.name: Sfcnn
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function model utilizing 3D convolutional neural networks to predict protein-ligand binding affinity, aiding in virtual screening and drug discovery processes.

tools.name: AFQuickPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook for plotting AlphaFold MSAs, pLDDT, and PAE
tools.detailed_description: A ready-to-use Jupyter notebook for visualizing key AlphaFold outputs, including Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSA), per-residue confidence (pLDDT), and Predicted Aligned Error (PAE), essential for interpreting structure predictions.

tools.name: PXDesignBench
tools.one_line_profile: Unified evaluation suite for protein design models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for evaluating protein design algorithms, providing standardized metrics and protocols to assess the quality and diversity of designed protein structures.

tools.name: PXMeter
tools.one_line_profile: Structural quality assessment for biomolecular structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing the structural quality of biomolecular structure prediction models, providing confidence metrics and validation scores to guide the usage of predicted structures.

tools.name: pymol-color-alphafold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to color AlphaFold structures by pLDDT confidence
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL extension that automatically colors AlphaFold-generated protein structures based on their pLDDT confidence scores, enabling immediate visual assessment of prediction reliability within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: PyRAMA
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Ramachandran plot for protein structure validation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to calculate and visualize Ramachandran plots, which are essential for validating the stereochemical quality of protein structures by analyzing backbone dihedral angles.

tools.name: AlphaFold
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced AI system for predicting protein 3D structure from amino acid sequence
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the AlphaFold 2 system, capable of predicting protein structures with atomic accuracy and providing confidence metrics (pLDDT, PAE) for quality assessment.

tools.name: deltaVinaXGB
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning based scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function that uses XGBoost and descriptors derived from AutoDock Vina to predict protein-ligand binding affinity, serving as a quality assessment tool for docking poses.

tools.name: tmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for TM-align and TM-score for protein structure comparison
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Python bindings for the TM-align algorithm and TM-score metric, widely used for structural alignment and quality assessment of protein structures.

tools.name: UMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection for dimension reduction and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose dimension reduction technique widely used in scientific data analysis (e.g., single-cell genomics, structural landscapes) to visualize and cluster high-dimensional data.

tools.name: ProteinGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Networks for protein model quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using Graph Convolutional Networks to predict the quality (score) of protein structure models, aiding in model selection and validation.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot learning dataset and benchmark for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark suite for evaluating few-shot learning models on molecular property prediction tasks, facilitating the development of models that generalize to new chemical spaces.

tools.name: RAMAplot
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Ramachandran plots for PDB structures and MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Ramachandran plots for single PDB structures and heatmaps for Molecular Dynamics (MD) trajectories, aiding in the validation of protein backbone conformations.

tools.name: NolinearTimeSeriesAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for nonlinear time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for performing nonlinear time series analysis on single or multi-channel data. It includes methods for phase space reconstruction (Taken's embedding), estimation of optimal delay and dimension, and construction of recurrence networks for complexity analysis.

tools.name: OpenMapFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid map creation with machine learning and earth observation data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating maps using machine learning and Earth observation data, developed by NASA Harvest. It facilitates the processing of satellite imagery for agricultural and environmental monitoring.

tools.name: RF-Score-VS
tools.one_line_profile: Random forest based protein-ligand scoring function
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function based on Random Forest for protein-ligand interactions, specifically designed for Virtual Screening applications to predict binding affinity or pose quality.

tools.name: USalign
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Structure Alignment for proteins and nucleic acids
tools.detailed_description: A unified tool for structural alignment of monomeric and complex structures of nucleic acids (DNA/RNA) and proteins. It supports TM-score based alignment and is a successor to TM-align for broader macromolecular scopes.

tools.name: DeepAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure alignment and analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for protein structure analysis, focusing on structure alignment. It utilizes evolutionary information and geometric features to perform accurate pairwise alignments.

tools.name: MolProbity
tools.one_line_profile: Protein and nucleic acid structure validation tool
tools.detailed_description: A widely used system for structure validation of proteins and nucleic acids. It provides detailed all-atom contact analysis, geometry checks, and quality scores (MolProbity score) to assess the physical realism of macromolecular structures.

tools.name: DLSCORE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based protein-ligand binding affinity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based scoring function designed to predict the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes, useful for evaluating docked poses and virtual screening.

tools.name: OPUS-CSF
tools.one_line_profile: C-atom-based scoring function for ranking protein structural models
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function that uses C-atom coordinates to rank protein structural models. It is part of the OPUS series of methods and is designed to evaluate the quality of predicted protein structures.

tools.name: pyRMSD
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient RMSD calculations for large sets of structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python package optimized for fast collective RMSD (Root Mean Square Deviation) calculations, particularly useful for analyzing large sets of biomolecular structures or trajectories.

tools.name: SDOCK2.0
tools.one_line_profile: FFT-based global protein-protein docking program
tools.detailed_description: A global protein-protein docking program that utilizes Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) and incorporates stepwise force field potentials in its scoring function to predict protein complex structures.

tools.name: DockQ
tools.one_line_profile: Quality measure for protein-protein docking models
tools.detailed_description: A standard quality measure for evaluating protein-protein docking models. It combines Fnat, LRMS, and iRMS into a single score to assess the accuracy of a docked complex against a reference structure.

tools.name: ProQDock
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein docking scoring program
tools.detailed_description: A scoring program for protein-protein docking models that uses Support Vector Regression (SVR) trained on high-level coordinate-driven features (all-atom and interface) to predict model quality.

tools.name: OnionNet-SFCT
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based scoring function correction term for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: OnionNet-SFCT is a deep learning model designed to improve the accuracy of protein-ligand docking and virtual screening. It acts as a scoring function correction term (SFCT) that refines the scoring of docked poses, thereby enhancing the reliability of structure-based drug design workflows.
